title: FS: T206 Joss Portrait MISCUT BACK
author: t206blogcom

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Joss Portrait MISCUT BACK
posts.post_content:
Willing to sell my T206 Joss portrait miscut back if the price is right. Asking $2500 / obo. PM or email: [url]jason@jasonstricker.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/T206-Joss-Portrait-Miscut-Back.jpg[/IMG]

I am amazed of the prices of miscuts on the T206's   I remember back in the 80's when we had these in our collections or inventory---We would discount them very low--most collectors didnt want them or would buy them very low--Oh well  times have changed.
